text: læa meux sayya hæng khwam cring di kıl khea ma khna nan reuxng khxng brrda phu ptiseth sraththa khux sayta khxng brrda phu ptiseth ca cxng khemng læw klaw wa “xo khwam hayna khxng rea! Nænxn ying rea xyu nı khwam hlnglum (cak thang hlab thi na klaw ni) ying kwa nan rea yang pen phu xthrrm xik dwy
